# Supervision and mentoring


During my postdoctoral activity [see my [experience section](./experience.qmd)], I have helped the team leader of my research group also by supervising the students. 
My support consisted in providing research guidance on both the theoretical understanding and the technical tasks.
This was implemented with regular meetings, and higher-frequency updates on their progress with the project's milestones.
